1.12.2.1.0.1: New config LogAllEvents to help test your configs live in the world.  Config system now supports wildcards such as cyclicmagic:*_ore or tconstruct:* but note it is not limited to ore it looks at all blocks mined.
1.12.2.1.0.2: New feature: PacifyIronGolems is turned on by default which disables all aggro and damage from iron golems to players.

1.14.4.0.0.2: Fixed a crash from a bad class import.
